医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，父母愿意为孩子的早餐添加蔬菜研究表明，尽管存在社会规范和实际挑战，父母仍愿意在孩子的早餐中加入蔬菜，他们认识到蔬菜对健康有益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Parents-open-to-veggies-for-kids-breakfast-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Parents-open-to-veggies-for-kids-breakfast-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aac39ef2-a708-4239-991b-5c19e125d5af Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Parents open to veggies for kids' breakfast, study finds
梅毒：一种无声的流行病重新苏醒研究报告称，印度梅毒病例显着增加，强调尽管有有效的治疗方法，但仍需要有效的预防和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Syphilis-A-silent-epidemic-reawakens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Syphilis-A-silent-epidemic-reawakens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e04a0f4-032f-47e0-bafa-b703c8759657 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:27:00 -0500 Syphilis: A silent epidemic reawakens
早期全血输血可提高创伤患者的生存率创伤性损伤导致的大量出血是美国可预防死亡的第一大原因，大多数死亡发生在六小时内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Early-whole-blood-transfusion-boosts-survival-in-trauma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Early-whole-blood-transfusion-boosts-survival-in-trauma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=730bd407-e010-428b-a248-67c7e5d64540 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:19:00 -0500 Early whole blood transfusion boosts survival in trauma patients
揭开癌症患者记忆快速丧失背后的谜团在一种罕见但严重的癌症并发症中，人体自身的免疫系统会开始攻击大脑，导致快速发生的记忆丧失和认知缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Unveiling-the-mystery-behind-rapid-memory-loss-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Unveiling-the-mystery-behind-rapid-memory-loss-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff9bbec-8e59-44d3-bd0b-987bd882adb7 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:01:40 -0500 Unveiling the mystery behind rapid memory loss in cancer patients
研究为改善胶质母细胞瘤患者的个性化治疗铺平了道路巴伦西亚理工大学 ITACA 研究所领导的一项研究，加泰罗尼亚肿瘤研究所 (ICO)、德国特里亚斯一普霍尔研究所 (IGTP) 和巴塞罗那医院诊所参与参与，开辟了一种新方法改善胶质母细胞瘤患者的个性化治疗，胶质母细胞瘤是当今最具侵袭性的癌症类型之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-paves-the-way-for-improving-personalized-treatment-of-病人-with-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-paves-the-way-for-improving-personalized-treatment-of-病人-with-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c18181d-ff04-43e6-a297-2f121ccee989 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 20:43:00 -0500 Study paves the way for improving personalized treatment of patients with glioblastoma
开创性的存储库旨在提高对精神疾病患者的可见度和认识隐喻不仅仅是作家用来修饰文本的文学手段。它们是日常生活中使用的语言工具，在大多数情况下，目的是更好地理解和传达我们周围世界的现实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Pioneering-repository-aims-to-raise-visibility-and-awareness-about-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Pioneering-repository-aims-to-raise-visibility-and-awareness-about-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ddab91e-8df7-469d-9c4a-bb4f256770c1 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 20:16:00 -0500 Pioneering repository aims to raise visibility and awareness about people with mental illnesses
研究人员发现了一类针对癌症干细胞的新型化合物许多癌症疗法除了产生许多副作用之外，还无法实现肿瘤的完全缓解，部分原因是存在难以根除的癌症干细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Researchers-discover-new-class-of-compound-that-targets-cancer-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Researchers-discover-new-class-of-compound-that-targets-cancer-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=944b5567-0a36-4be8-9806-7241f43cfcaf Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:41:05 -0500 Researchers discover new class of compound that targets cancer stem cells
科学家发现了一种“破解”神经元内部时钟以加速脑细胞发育的方法构成我们大脑和神经系统的神经元会在数月内缓慢成熟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Scientists-uncover-a-way-to-hack-neurons-internal-clocks-to-speed-up-brain-cell-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Scientists-uncover-a-way-to-hack-neurons-internal-clocks-to-speed-up-brain-cell-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75edb9a3-546d-4a4b-bec9-5322580883b5 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:36:56 -0500 Scientists uncover a way to "hack" neurons' internal clocks to speed up brain cell development
小脑在运动引起的焦虑缓解中发挥关键作用歌德说：“只有锻炼才能消除各种疑虑。”体育锻炼是身体和心灵之间的润滑剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Cerebellum-plays-key-role-in-exercise-induced-anxiety-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Cerebellum-plays-key-role-in-exercise-induced-anxiety-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53fa27a9-41b4-4bef-9054-c9b06ceb4d70 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:28:30 -0500 Cerebellum plays key role in exercise-induced anxiety relief
呃研究人员旨在彻底改变三阴性乳腺癌的治疗方案休斯顿大学药学院药物发现研究所的一名研究人员正在努力证明奈必洛尔（FDA 批准的治疗高血压的药物）可有效治疗三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC)，从而彻底改变三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/UH-researcher-aims-to-revolutionize-treatment-regimens-for-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/UH-researcher-aims-to-revolutionize-treatment-regimens-for-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a41453a-9fce-4ac7-b4e6-7158b26cbd12 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:23:10 -0500 UH researcher aims to revolutionize treatment regimens for triple-negative breast cancer
